document.full_text: peru's once staid presidential race has turned into an unpredictable five-way contest that is rattling local financial markets as front-runner alejandro toledo plunges in polls.
document.title: peru's staid presidential race goes topsy-turvy
lines_and_colors: peru's once staid presidential race has turned into an unpredictable five-way contest that is rattling local financial markets as front-runner alejandro toledo plunges in polls.
